> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20396?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [670c2e4...0ee1367](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20396?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

I personally have some doubts about this deprecation. 1) a lot of people use this, just changing it for cosmetic reasons can be annoying, 2) I actually find the current name much more self-explanatory.
